title: Conflicts of interest stood out as the real duels of these World Championships in the desert
text:
The climax of these strange, unpredictable and endlessly controversial World Championships brought one final twist on Sunday. Five days after its publication, it turned out that Sebastian Coe had still not read the US Anti-Doping Agency’s full report on banning Alberto Salazar from athletics for four years, the scandal that has cast a grim pall over events in Doha.

It is becoming quite a habit of Coe’s, this partial processing of sensitive information. When email attachments reached him in 2014, laying out allegations from Russian distance runner Liliya Shobhukova that she had paid almost £450,000 to cover up positive doping tests after being blackmailed by senior athletics officials, he chose...
description: The climax of these strange, unpredictable and endlessly controversial World Championships brought one final twist on Sunday.
